title: Crime Alert 01.14.22
itunes:title: Crime Alert 01.14.22
description:
Woman thinks she's firing a BB gun at her boyfriend. He's hit in the neck and dies. Traffic stop leads police to meth in the driver's pocket, but he claims the pants are not his.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

itunes:summary: Man calls police after getting into a fight with his long time boyfriend, to say he's asleep on the couch. He's now charged with murder.  A late night glitter attack leads to felony burglary charges.
